long_description: Diamondback Impression 20 in. kids' bike is ready to roll. Whether riding around the neighborhood or to soccer practice, its sturdy, stylish construction will get them there. Sturdy, high-tensile steel frame and fork stand up to demanding use. Sloped top tube accommodates a short stand-over height and lets kids comfortably put their feet flat on the ground while straddling the bike. Front pouch conveniently stashes small essentials. Single-speed drivetrain with protective chainguard offers simplicity and low maintenance. Rear coaster brake and hand-operated rear brake give kids 2 options to control their speed, letting them learn the nuances of hand-operated brakes with backup of coaster brake. Specs on the Diamondback Impression 20 in. kids' bike are subject to change.
short_description: Diamondback Impression 20 in. kids' bike is ready to roll. Whether riding around the neighborhood or to soccer practice, its sturdy, stylish construction will get them there.
